message.content:
cs.DC, cs.OS, cs.AR, cs.SY, cs.DB. 

The paper discusses a new caching scheme for virtualized platforms, which is related to data centers and cloud computing. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also mentions the implementation of the scheme in an open source hypervisor, which suggests a possible category of cs.OS (Operating Systems). The use of SSDs and HDDs in the storage subsystems may also relate to cs.AR (Architecture), while the dynamic adjustment of cache size and write policy may relate to cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed scheme using experimental results, which may suggest a possible category of cs.DB (Databases).
